summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Cherry Street from Twenty-ninth Avenue to a point one hundred twenty (120) feet west of Thirty second Avenue et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewer under Ordinance No. 13302, creating Local Improvement District No. 1206 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
